tossup_question: -   –  What group of light-absorbing compounds, including chlorophyll b and carotenoids, are found in photosynthetic organisms and work with chlorophyll a to expand the action spectrum of the organism?
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three statements that are true regarding fats: 1) Fats are a more efficient form of energy storage than proteins; 2) Fats play a role in cell structure; 3) Fats are a less efficient form of energy storage than carbohydrates.
